solution.text:
According to the data provided in the question,
\(\Rightarrow 4x + _{k}_ = _{{(4*j) + k}}_\)
Taking _{k}_ to RHS we get:
\(\Rightarrow 4x=_{{(4*j) + k}}_-_{k}_\)
\(\Rightarrow 4x=_{{4*j}}_\)
Dividing both sides by 4 we get:
\(\Rightarrow x=_{j}_\)

content.text: Find the value of x if the sum of four times x, and _{k}_ is _{{(4*j) + k}}_
